scripts.android:clean: sh -c 'if [ -d android ]; then rm -rf android/build android/app/build android/.gradle android/.cxx android/app/.cxx || true; fi; if command -v adb >/dev/null 2>&1 && adb devices | grep -q "device$"; then adb uninstall com.anonymous.beakerstack 2>/dev/null || true; fi; npx expo run:android'
scripts.ios:clean: sh -c 'if [ -d ios ]; then rm -rf ios/build ios/DerivedData || true; rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* 2>/dev/null || true; fi; if command -v xcrun >/dev/null 2>&1 && xcrun simctl list devices | grep -qi "booted"; then xcrun simctl list devices | grep -i "booted" | sed "s/.*(\([^)]*\)).*/\1/" | xargs -I {} xcrun simctl uninstall {} com.anonymous.beakerstack 2>/dev/null || true; fi; cd ../.. && node apps/mobile/scripts/apply-patches.js && cd apps/mobile && npx expo run:ios'
scripts.rebuild: sh -c 'echo "üî® Starting iOS rebuild..."; if command -v xcrun >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! xcrun simctl list devices | grep -qi "booted"; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: No booted iOS simulators detected. Make sure your simulator is running."; fi; fi; ../../scripts/clean-rebuild.sh && npx expo run:ios'
scripts.rebuild:android: sh -c 'echo "üî® Starting Android rebuild..."; if command -v adb >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! adb devices | grep -q "device$"; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: No Android devices/emulators detected. Make sure your emulator is running."; fi; fi; ../../scripts/clean-rebuild.sh && npx expo run:android'
scripts.android:uninstall: adb uninstall com.anonymous.beakerstack || echo 'App not installed or no device connected'
scripts.ios:uninstall: sh -c 'if command -v xcrun >/dev/null 2>&1; then booted=$(xcrun simctl list devices | grep -i "booted" | sed "s/.*(\([^)]*\)).*/\1/" | head -1); if [ -n "$booted" ]; then xcrun simctl uninstall "$booted" com.anonymous.beakerstack && echo "App uninstalled from simulator $booted" || echo "App not installed or uninstall failed"; else echo "No booted iOS simulator found"; fi; else echo "xcrun not available"; fi'
scripts.clean: rm -rf android/build ios/build android/.gradle android/.cxx ios/DerivedData
scripts.build:dev:ios: sh -c 'if [ -z "$EXPO_TOKEN" ]; then for env_file in .env.local ../../.env.local; do if [ -f "$env_file" ]; then set -a && source "$env_file" && set +a && break; fi; done; fi; if [ -z "$EXPO_TOKEN" ]; then echo "‚ùå EXPO_TOKEN is required."; echo "   Add it to apps/mobile/.env.local or root .env.local:"; echo "   EXPO_TOKEN=your-token-here"; echo "   Or set it as an environment variable: EXPO_TOKEN=... npm run build:dev:ios"; exit 1; fi; EXPO_TOKEN="$EXPO_TOKEN" npx --yes eas-cli build --platform ios --profile development'

scripts.install:dev:ios: sh -c 'if [ -z "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" ]; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Set EAS_BUILD_PATH to the path of the .ipa file or .app directory"; echo "Example: EAS_BUILD_PATH=~/Downloads/BeakerStack.ipa npm run install:dev:ios"; echo "Or for local builds: npm run install:dev:ios:local"; exit 1; fi; if [ -d "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" ]; then APP_PATH="$EAS_BUILD_PATH"; elif [ -f "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" ] && [[ "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" == *.tar.gz ]]; then TMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d); tar -xzf "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" -C "$TMP_DIR"; APP_PATH="$TMP_DIR/BeakerStack.app"; else APP_PATH="$EAS_BUILD_PATH"; fi; xcrun simctl install booted "$APP_PATH" && xcrun simctl launch booted com.anonymous.beakerstack && echo "‚úÖ Development build installed and launched"'
scripts.install:dev:ios:local: sh -c 'LATEST_BUILD=$(ls -t build-*.tar.gz 2>/dev/null | head -1); if [ -z "$LATEST_BUILD" ]; then echo "‚ùå No local build found. Run: npm run build:dev:ios:local"; exit 1; fi; echo "üì¶ Extracting $LATEST_BUILD..."; TMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d); tar -xzf "$LATEST_BUILD" -C "$TMP_DIR"; APP_PATH="$TMP_DIR/BeakerStack.app"; if [ ! -d "$APP_PATH" ]; then echo "‚ùå Could not find BeakerStack.app in build archive"; exit 1; fi; echo "üì± Installing to simulator..."; xcrun simctl install booted "$APP_PATH" && xcrun simctl launch booted com.anonymous.beakerstack && echo "‚úÖ Development build installed and launched" && rm -rf "$TMP_DIR"'
scripts.install:dev:android: sh -c 'if [ -z "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" ]; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Set EAS_BUILD_PATH to the path of the downloaded .apk file"; echo "Example: EAS_BUILD_PATH=~/Downloads/BeakerStack.apk npm run install:dev:android"; echo "Or for local builds: npm run install:dev:android:local"; exit 1; fi; adb install -r "$EAS_BUILD_PATH" && adb shell monkey -p com.anonymous.beakerstack 1 && echo "‚úÖ Development build installed and launched"'
scripts.install:dev:android:local: sh -c 'LATEST_BUILD=$(ls -t build-*.apk 2>/dev/null | head -1); if [ -z "$LATEST_BUILD" ]; then echo "‚ùå No local build found.
